definition: to make use of one's position to gain profit for oneself or one's associates

pinyin: she4 hui4 gong1 gong4 li4 yi4

sentences.english: But they disagree over the source of their disagreement.
sentences.chinese: 然两国争执的源由是双方的严重利益分歧所在。

sentences.english: The proceeds as generated from any rule-breaking trading shall be dealt with pursuant to the relevant regulations.
sentences.chinese: 在违规交易中所获利益，依照有关规定处理。

sentences.english: Interest group comes from some people's maintenance of common interests.
sentences.chinese: 利益集团来自于部分人对共同利益的维护。

sentences.english: Interest group comes from some people's maintenance of common interests.
sentences.chinese: 利益集团来自于部分人对共同利益的维护。

sentences.english: But investment in global health is in the national interest too, " Varmus told The Times.
sentences.chinese: 而且投资全球卫生也是国家利益的一部分。

sentences.english: Globalization will not self-regulate in ways that ensure fair distribution of benefits.
sentences.chinese: 全球化不会自我调节，确保公平分配利益。

sentences.english: For his own personal interest, Mr. Chen ratted on his government.
sentences.chinese: 陈先生为了个人利益，背叛了他的政府。

sentences.english: The new policy on food price will hurt the interest of people on low incomes.
sentences.chinese: 新的食品价格政策将伤害到低收入人群的利益。

sentences.english: Offending United States because of Irq is not in their national interests.
sentences.chinese: 为伊拉克而得罪美国，不符合他们的国家利益啊。

sentences.english: Miss Nien always has the best interests of her students at heart.
sentences.chinese: 粘老师总是处处为她学生的利益为着想。

sentences.english: China has a big stake in Myanmar.It is the country’s leading foreign investor. Myitsone is one of manyhydropower, mining and infrastructure projects there.
sentences.chinese: 中国在缅甸拥有重大利益，是该国重要的外国投资者。

sentences.english: He is also a contributing editor to The National Interest.
sentences.chinese: 他也是一名《国家利益》特约编辑。

sentences.english: We outrage at the sinful violation of the poeple's interests and rights.
sentences.chinese: 我们对侵犯人民利益和权利的罪恶行经表示强烈愤慨。

sentences.english: A noble professional virtue is in accord with the fundamental interests of the Party and the people.
sentences.chinese: 崇高的职业道德是与党和人民的根本利益相一致的。

sentences.english: Honor and profit lie not in one sack.
sentences.chinese: 代表荣耀，荣誉与利益自古难两全。

sentences.english: Part II The relationship between the Corporate Goverance and the protection of the minority shareholders.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分小股东利益保护与公司治理的关系。

definition: to seek/to strive for/to obtain/see also 牟取[mou2 qu3]
right (i.e. an entitlement to sth)/(classical) power and wealth
to gain profit (by underhand means)/to exploit/see also 謀取|谋取[mou2 qu3]
to make a profit/to gain/to get an advantage
